short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for letting Claude think like a real human

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For further information and use instructions, please check here: https://github.com/richards199999/Thinking-Claude

Enhance your Claude experience with this thoughtfully designed Chrome extension. It automatically collapses Claude's "thinking" code blocks, letting you focus on the key conversation while still providing easy access to the complete thought process.
With a single click, you can expand and collapse the thinking details as needed. The extension seamlessly integrates with Claude's chat interface, matching its look and feel. It also preserves helpful features like thoughts copying.
Whether you're a power user who wants a streamlined chat view or simply appreciate intuitive UI enhancements, this extension offers a valuable upgrade to your Claude interactions. Install it now and enjoy a cleaner, more manageable conversation view.
